title: Iraiva Lyrics Hiphop Tamizhan
stanzas:
Iraiva Song Lyrics From Hiphop Tamizhan Album
#HipHopTamizha

Aam, indha vazhkai
oru nadaga medai
adhil nadithidum
nadigargal naam

indha vazhkai oru
puthagam endraal
adhu kooridum
paadam naam

indha vazhkayil
kadhaigalo nooru
andha kadhaigalai
naan unakku solgiren
kaelu
yeah.. yeah..
hip hop tamizha
Aadhi..

this ones for you
listen

aval peyar selvi
karka ponaal kalvi

pallikoodam pogayila
gavanam padippil illa
puthimathi solla
yaarumillai, karanam

iavalukku thaayum illai
thandhayo podhaiyila
parithaavam ival nilamai

paasamindru verumai
paasam kaatta thanthaikku
neramillai, enna kodumai

paasam thaedi alaindhaal
padhumai, kidakala
adhanaal podhaiku
ival adimai.

thozhi endra peril silaper
kadhalithu paar
ena moottivittu palaper

kadhalaithaal oruvanai
avanum nallavan illai
paavam enna seeivaal
ondrum ariyaadha
chinna pillai.

orunaal podhaiyila
porvaikkul pogayila
avanum anaithukolla
ivalum thadukkavilla

idhumattum indri
pala pengaludan thodarbu
kadaisiyil oru naal
idhu avalukku therindhu
sendraal prindhu
ivanai marandhu

kayavanin pasikindha
kuzhandhai virundhu
vilaivu
kadhal tholvi
ilavasa inaipaaga HIV

marana padukkayil
vazhkai therindhadhu.
seidha thavarai enni
manam ingu varundhudhu

padhinaaru vayadhinile
vazhkai mudiya vendumaa
kangalai moodinaal
iraivanidam vendinaal

iraivaa
enakkoru enakkoru
varam thaa
azhudhidum chinna
pillai naan
undhan kaigalil
yaendhi kolvaai (2)

orr naalil ethanai uravu
oru nodiyil
eththanai kanavu
kaanal neeraai
karaigirathe

vazhkayil kastam
varalaam
vazhve kastam endraal
iraivaa naanum
enna seiven.

kanneere kanneere
kadal pole
vazhindhadhe.

kastangal, nastangal
kannuku therikindradhe

ivan peyar Saravanan
vayadho ettu.
ivan kadhai kaettu
kelambittadhu
kanneer sottu.

sondha thaai thandhai
ivanai kai vittadhu.
natpaale kettadhu
kadaisiyil seththadhu

thandhai kudigaaran
thaai sariyillai pokku.
siru vayadhile
indha pinju nenjil
nanjai vidhaithu

samudhaayam odhutkida
thavaraana nanbargal
siruvayadhil podhaiku
adimaiyaagum siruvargal

varumai,
ivan thiramaiyai
kattipottadhu.
kalaigan aagum kanavi
vetti potadhu

kaikodukka yaarumillai
kayyil kooda kaasu illai
ayyo paavam enna seivaan
ivan chinna pillai.

nabarudan serndhukondu
seidhaan mudhal thiruttu.
panirendu vayadhil
ivan mela vazhakku.

irandu varudathula
ivan mella mell
maarinaan

padhi naangu vayathil
kolaikaaran aagiraan
kaasukkaa nanbane
kaatti kodukka

nadu roattil
vetti ivan
rendu uyirai parikka

naai adichu potaakooda
naalu peru ketpaanga
yaarum vandhu thookavilla
ketka oru naadhiyilla

maranap padukkayil
vazhkai therindhadhu
seidha thavarai enni
manam ingu varundhudhu

padhinaaru vayadhinile
vazhkai mudiya vendumaa.
kangalai moodinaan
iraivanidam vendinaan.

iraivaa
enakkoru enakkoru
varam thaa
azhudhidum chinna
pillai naan
undhan kaigalil
